dcterms:description: The Mixamo dataset comprises animations performed by various virtual characters with different shapes; however, the dataset does not guarantee consistent hand motion quality and diversity.
dcterms:title: Mixamo

dcterms:creator: Gyeongsik Moon
Shoou-I Yu
He Wen
Takaaki Shiratori
Kyoung Mu Lee
dcterms:description: The InterHand2.6M dataset is a comprehensive collection of hand motion data captured using a multi-view camera system and supplemented with MANO hand pose annotations.
dcterms:title: InterHand2.6M
